phases.state: The mission is to locate a ball in a 50x50 meter field. The drone is at (5.0, 5.0) meters, flying at an altitude of 10.0 meters, ready to begin systematic scanning. The drone's task is to identify the 10x10 meter square containing the ball.
phases.phase_target: Systematically scan the field to identify the 10x10 meter square containing the ball.

phases.state: The drone has identified a 10x10 meter square containing the ball. It is hovering above the identified square, ready to communicate the location to the robot dog.
phases.phase_target: Communicate the coordinates of the identified 10x10 meter square to the robot dog.

phases.state: We have a mission to locate and retrieve a ball. The drone has identified the 10x10 meter area containing the ball. The robot dog is at the starting point (25,25), ready to begin scanning.
phases.phase_target: Move to the center of the identified 10x10 meter area to begin scanning for the ball.

phases.state: The robot dog is positioned at the center of the identified 10x10 meter area, ready to scan for the ball. It can scan 2 meters in all directions.
phases.phase_target: Scan the area to locate the exact position of the ball within the 10x10 meter area.

phases.state: The robot dog has located the ball at the precise coordinates within the 10x10 meter area. It is ready to retrieve the ball.
phases.phase_target: Move to the ball's location and pick it up.

phases.state: The robot dog has retrieved the ball and is ready to return to the starting point.
phases.phase_target: Return to the starting point at (25,25) with the ball.
